summary: This is an email chain from November 2021 regarding a review of flight records in the Epstein case. An intern reviewed attached flight manifests and confirmed there were no records from the 1990s (all were from 2004 or 2005), and that certain individuals were not mentioned in the records.

events.title: Flight Record Review Completion
events.description: An intern completed a review of flight records and confirmed there were no records from the 1990s (all were from 2004 or 2005) and that certain individuals were not mentioned.

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: Flight records reviewed were all from 2004 or 2005, with no records from the 1990s.
Certain individuals were not mentioned in the flight records reviewed.
The document references attached flight manifests and defense rule 16 disclosures in the Epstein case discovery.
The correspondence involves the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
